title: Celigo Integration Platform: Why It's the Smart Choice for NetSuite Businesses
subTitle: Pre-Built Connectors and Real-Time Integration Without the Custom Development Headaches
description: Discover why Celigo has become the go-to integration platform for NetSuite businesses, offering pre-built connectors, powerful automation, and enterprise-grade reliability.
author: James Plant
